channel.title: Lag help!
channel.description: Hello, i downloaded this awesome mod today and played it and everything worked fine, i got to the part when you get your crowbar and then i saved game and turned off my laptop (hibernated). Now when i started the game i get TERRIBLE lag even on minimal settings. My FPS is ~5. What happened?? I have HP ProBook 4535s

item.title: Lag help!
item.dc:creator: cartman300
item.description:
Hello, i downloaded this awesome mod today and played it and everything
worked fine, i got to the part when you get your crowbar and then i saved game and turned off my laptop (hibernated). Now when i started the game
i get TERRIBLE lag even on minimal settings. My FPS is ~5.
